Action.author: kchristidis
Action.body: Please provide a detailed description of what you're doing (a precise list of steps), what you expect, and what you get instead. Logs are good (in fact, logs are necessary) *but logs alone are not enough*.

Action.author: kchristidis
Action.body: No update in more than a week, closing. Please re-open with appropriate level of detail if the issue is still relevant.
